Our policy learning forums on #UpskillingPathways provide a platform for countries to learn from one another and explore challenges in upskilling adults with low skills. They can also achieve consensus-building around shared problems.

Cedefop Executive Director @JuergenSiebel https://t.co/3VtfX8Ah1V

Based on indicators that go beyond formal qualifications, Cedefop estimates that almost half of EU adults have low or outdated skills. Progressing with the implementation of the #UpskillingPathways Recommendation is ever more relevant.

Cedefop Executive Director @JuergenSiebel https://t.co/R4XbEFOvGk

Recent 🇪🇺 policy developments build on the principle that the best investment is in people. They recognise that we do not all start from the same point and support is needed to unleash an individual’s full potential.

Cedefop Executive Director @JuergenSiebel

The #Covid19 pandemic has resulted in job losses and reorganisation of work through new technologies. There is a need to support all people in preparing for, and keeping pace with, change.
